LanguageData.VCE_SimpleGrill.label: simple grill
LanguageData.VCE_SimpleGrill.description: A simple grilled meat cooked from a few ingredients. Very filling, grilled meats allow people to not feel hunger for a long time. Freezing them ruins this effect.
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedSimpleGrill.label: ruined simple grill
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedSimpleGrill.description: A simple grilled meat cooked from a few ingredients. This grill has been frozen, and as such it is still edible but much less filling. It won't provide the "well fed" buff.
LanguageData.VCE_FineGrill.label: fine grill
LanguageData.VCE_FineGrill.description: A complex grilled meat assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients. Very filling, grilled meats allow people to not feel hunger for a long time. Freezing them ruins this effect.
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedFineGrill.label: ruined fine grill
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedFineGrill.description: A complex grilled meat assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients. This grill has been frozen, and as such it is still edible but much less filling. It won't provide the "well fed" buff.
LanguageData.VCE_LavishGrill.label: lavish grill
LanguageData.VCE_LavishGrill.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this grilled meat nourishes the body, mind, and soul. Very filling, grilled meats allow people to not feel hunger for a long time. Freezing them ruins this effect.
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedLavishGrill.label: ruined lavish grill
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedLavishGrill.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this grilled meat nourishes the body, mind, and soul. This grill has been frozen, and as such it is still edible but much less filling. It won't provide the "well fed" buff.
LanguageData.VCE_GourmetGrill.label: gourmet grill
LanguageData.VCE_GourmetGrill.description: A culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity grilled meat. Very filling, grilled meats allow people to not feel hunger for a long time. Freezing them ruins this effect.
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedGourmetGrill.label: ruined gourmet grill
LanguageData.VCE_RuinedGourmetGrill.description: A culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity grilled meat. This grill has been frozen, and as such it is still edible but much less filling. It won't provide the "well fed" buff.
